about.text:
About IntelliSystems Mobile:
The Development team that created IntelliSystems Mobile consists of: - Eric Thortsen / Client-Server model/Server Code - Tenzing Lama / Database System - Nick Ludovici / GUI, Android Client
IntelliSystems Mobile was a project in a semester long Operating Systems class aimed to...
Resources Used: - MySQL - Expandable Lists - http://mylifewithandroid.blogspot.com/2008/05/expandable-lists.html
Android Code at: - http://github.com/nludovici20/Android-Distributed-Processing
Liscense used: ???
